column4: I can manage users in terminal using useradd and other commands, but not in the gui using the users-admin utility
There should be a button saying "unlock", or looking like a key, or like a lock. Press it.
I don't see that button...I remember seeing it before...but its gone now
No, that utility is not a part of compiz, compiz is the window manager. And by greying the window out it tells you that the app in this window hangs.
